header: Shutter is one of the most popular screenshot applications for Linux and now, due to a dependency it is about to be removed from Debian. It also happens to be the only popular Perl-based desktop applications around. So if you care for your screenshotting on Linux, or if you just care about Perl, this is a very good opportunity to contribute back. If you start updating Shutter let me know, so I can share your progress in the newsletter!
subject: Shutter, a nice Perl application, may be removed from Debian
